reviews.customers_say: Customers like the cardigan's style and material thickness. The length receives mixed feedback.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning
items.body: Super soft, perfect length, on trend...10/10 Read more
items.author: Amber Kent

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cardigan!
items.body: I love the length of the cardigan; I always liked the look of it whenever I saw it in stores. The material thickness is great, not thin, and the material itself feels good. Any time it's this kind of fabric/material, there will be pilling of some kind, so that is not a big issue. I'll wear it around the fall when it gets a lot cooler. The style is great, and I like how the model styled it on here. Great value for money. Read more
items.author: Jennifer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and comfortable
items.body: The material feels soft and drapes beautifully. It’s flattering without being clingy and works well for both casual and dressy occasions. Buttons are a bit delicate but still a great piece overall. Fits great and is not too heavy. Keeps me warm. Read more
items.author: Into the Jungle we go

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
items.body: I ordered the sweater in brown and grey and both colors are completely different than the pictures. The brown has a very orange tint to it, and the grey is more blue/purple. Very disappointed that the picture does not reflect the true color. Returned because it was not what I expected at all. I also ordered a small and it is very long. The material thickness itself is fine and the fabric is soft. Read more
items.author: Kindly Said

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best purchase
items.body: One of the nicest items I've ever ordered on Amazon. Perfect fit. Great quality. The tan is not a solid color. Its beautiful. Do not hesitate to buy!! I ordered a medium 5'8" 137lbs. Perfect. Read more
items.author: kim mccafferty

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed
items.body: Coloring and buttons look nothing like the photos Read more
items.author: Kitty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I loved it!
items.body: I loved it. Isnt exacly for winter but you can use it when isnt that cold ;) Read more
items.author: Laura Bueno

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Gray, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
